metadata.title: Apple Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra) is installed
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Apple Mac OS X 10.13 (High Sierra).

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:12551 - Modifications vary from minor OVAL title/description changes to suggesting an alternative CPE name to use.

criterion.comment: The Installed Operating System is Part of the Mac OS Family
Apple Mac OS X version is less than 10.14.0

plist_test.comment: The Installed Operating System is Part of the Mac OS Family
Apple Mac OS X version is less than 10.14.0

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutomaticCheckEnabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutoUpdate']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.commerce.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='ConfigDataInstall']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='CriticalUpdateInstall']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.SoftwareUpdate.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='AutoUpdateRestartRequired']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.commerce.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='ControllerPowerState']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.Bluetooth.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='menuExtras']/following-sibling::*[1] in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.systemuiserver.plist operation pattern match datatype string and value /System/Library/CoreServices/Menu Extras/Bluetooth.menu

macos:systemsetup_test.comment: Ensure macos:systemsetup_usingnetworktime with operation equals and datatype boolean
Ensure macos:systemsetup_usingnetworktime with operation equals and datatype boolean

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='idleTime']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.screensaver.plist operation equals datatype int and value 600
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='idleTime']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.screensaver.plist operation less than or equal datatype int and value 1200
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='wvous-tl-corner']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.dock operation not equal datatype int and value 6

macos:systemsetup_test.comment: Ensure macos:systemsetup_remoteappleevents with operation equals and datatype boolean

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key/following-sibling::*[1]/key[text()='Enabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.nat.plist operation equals datatype int and value 0

unix:file_test.comment: Ensure no file named /Library/Preferences/SystemConfiguration/com.apple.nat exists and unknown test

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.screensharing.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true

macos:systemprofiler_test.comment: Ensure SPPrintersDataType in /plist/array[1]/dict[1]/key[.='_items']/following-sibling::array[1]/dict/key[.='shared']/following-sibling::*[1] operation equals datatype string and value no

macos:systemsetup_test.comment: Ensure macos:systemsetup_remotelogin with operation equals and datatype boolean

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.ODSAgent.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true

macos:systemprofiler_test.comment: Ensure SPBluetoothDataType in /plist/array[1]/dict[1]/key[.='_items']/following-sibling::*[1]/dict/key[.='services_title']/following-sibling::*[1]/dict/key/following-sibling::*[1]/key[.='service_state']/following-sibling::*[1] operation equals datatype st

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.AppleFileServer.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Disabled']/following-sibling::*[1]/name() in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.smbd.plist operation equals datatype boolean and value true

macos:systemsetup_test.comment: Ensure macos:systemsetup_wakeonnetworkaccess with operation equals and datatype boolean

macos:gatekeeper_test.comment: Ensure macos:gatekeeper_enabled with operation equals and datatype boolean is set

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='globalstate']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation greater than or equal datatype int and value 1
Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='globalstate']/following-sibling::*[1]/text() in /Library/Preferences/com.apple.alf.plist operation less than or equal datatype int and value 2
Ensure firewall stealth mode is enabled

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named ~/Library/Mobile/Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Documents exists and does not match pattern ^.*\stotal\s.*$
Ensure at least one file named ~/Library/Mobile/Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Desktop exists and does not match pattern ^.*\stotal\s.*$

Ensure /plist/dict/key[text()='Label']/following-sibling::*[1] in /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.auditd.plist operation equals datatype string and value com.apple.auditd

macos:plist511_test.comment: Ensure Firewall logging is enabled

Ensure /plist/dict/key[.='menuExtras']/following-sibling::*[1]/string[.='/System/Library/CoreServices/Menu Extras/AirPort.menu']/text() in $HOME/Library/Preferences/com.apple.systemuiserver.plist operation equals datatype string and value /System/Library/
Ensure httpd is disabled

Ensure any file(s) named *.app in /Applications exists and has permissions rwxr-xr-x and does not have permissions ----w--w-

Ensure Folders in /Library are not world writable

Ensure any file(s) named *.app in /Applications exists and has permissions rwxr-xr-x and does not have permissions ----w--w-
Ensure Folders in /System are not world writable
Ensure Folders in /Library are not world writable
